pullRequest.title: BrowserView reduce missing JavaFX logging in regular use
pullRequest.bodyText:
ExtensionHttpPanelBroswerView > In regular use just log the exception's getMessage() value. If debug is enabled log the whole stack trace as well.
CHANGELOG > Added change note.

Related to zaproxy/zaproxy#6339
Signed-off-by: kingthorin kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com

nodes.bodyText:
Why not debug? Looks odd check debug and then warn.
Could be done immediately after the above warn.

commit.message:
BrowserView reduce missing JavaFX logging in regular use

- ExtensionHttpPanelBroswerView > In regular use just log the
exception's `getMessage()` value. If debug is enabled log the whole
stack trace as well.
- CHANGELOG > Added change note.

Related to zaproxy/zaproxy#6339

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
